name: Fiery Survival
description:
A remaking of a certain fun minigame with some new gimmicks. Dodge and weave between the fiery obstacles as you, a Bomby, tries to survive in a fiery land.

Controls: Mouse to move, ESC to pause game(might have some trouble if game is in full screen)

Challenge: Make it to 3 min to be part of the Bomby squad. (Not actually real, just bragging rights)
